author: stefan2
msg: Fix the APR_INCOMPLETE failures in our test suite when joining the
test threads and don't show bogus return codes upon failure.
(test_thread): Explicitly end the test thread.  This seems to be the
Right Thing to do for non-detached threads.
(do_tests_concurrently): Make sure the return value has been initialized
